message: Let's start with a fair division. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can work out something better in the next rounds if you want.
That wasn't fair, Alice.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Take it or let's see how much the money shrinks!
Okay, I see your point.  Let's try 70/30 this time. It's still a good deal for both of us, and we can avoid the next round of inflation.
This is getting tedious, Alice.  I'm coming down to 55/45. It's more than fair considering the inflation. Let's wrap this up.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40. We can avoid further inflation and get something reasonable out of this deal.
